features: Ergonomic Office Chair:Wide back with breathable nylon mesh.According to the ergonomic waist support design is suitable for people with poor lumbar spine, protect your waist and spine during long working hours.High quality molded sponge with strong resilience, seat cushion is designed in accordance with the shape of human buttocks suitable for long seating.

Comfort:The breathable nylon mesh back and 4-inch thick streamlined seat cushion are soft and elastic. High-quality molded sponge can be used for a long time without deformation and collapse.Nylon mesh and molded foam greatly improve the breathability and durability to avoid the feeling of muggy,especially in the hot season.

Function:Height adjustable arms with soft thickened arm cushion,,press the plating button can be adjusted the height.And armrests can be flipped up,you can insert the chair under the table to save the room pace.
Stability:High standard and quality 360-dgrees swivel office chair with PU castors allow you to move anyway.

After-sales Service:BOLISS has a good after-sales service, the purpose of BOLISS is to serve every customer and solve the needs of customers.The chair is provided 24 months warranty,if you have any questions,please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and styish.
reviews.reviewText: Great office chair. The arms work well for a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Office chair, adjustable
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried out the BOLISS Mesh Desk Chair, which has exceeded my expectations. Having a comfortable and supportive chair is crucial as someone who spends long hours working at my desk, and this chair delivers on all fronts.First and foremost, the chair's design is sleek and modern, adding a touch of sophistication to any office or workspace. The black color scheme exudes a professional and elegant look. The overall build quality feels sturdy and durable, giving me confidence that this chair will last long.One of the standout features of the chair is its ergonomic design. The mesh backrest provides excellent breathability, keeping me cool and comfortable even during extended periods of sitting. The adjustable height feature allows me to find the perfect position that suits my desk setup, ensuring optimal posture and reducing strain on my back and neck.I particularly appreciate the flipped arms of this chair. They provide additional support and comfort when needed, but I can quickly flip them up and out of the way when I prefer an armless configuration. This flexibility is a great feature, especially when working on tasks requiring more freedom of movement. A minor criticism is that the arms don't lock in a set position if desired.The chair's 300-lb weight capacity is impressive and adds to its versatility. It feels sturdy and stable, providing ample support for users of various sizes. The smooth-rolling casters make it easy to move around my workspace without hassle, and the 360-degree swivel feature allows for effortless maneuverability.In terms of functionality, this chair excels. The height adjustment mechanism is smooth and easy to use, allowing for quick and effortless changes in seat height. The tilt function with a locking mechanism adds another layer of customization, enabling me to find the perfect balance between comfort and productivity.Overall, this chair is an excellent option for anyone seeking comfort, style, and functionality in their office chair. Its sleek design, ergonomic features, and flexible options make it a standout choice. Whether working, gaming, or sitting at my desk, this chair provides the support and comfort I need to stay focused and productive throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable chair. The arm rest is soft .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The seat does not support a heavy person
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair to support my back and my weight. I am 250 lbs and I can feel seams and unevenness in the seat causing me pain. The back support is also inexistent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable Attractive Chair
reviews.reviewText: If you do a lot of computer time then you know how important a good chair is and how much better you feel in it and after you get up. I have a chair or two around that can after a while give me a back ach whereas this is comfortable all around with no discomfort. It also gives you a lot of wiggle room in it from being wide and not crowding your sides. The seat and arm rests are great and the back breathable which is a bonus too. Of course you have your height adjustment and it rolls easily. The instruction sheet that comes with it is pretty helpful in assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy, adjustable and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This office chair came well-packed. The pieces were well-secure in the package and it included the tools and the extra pieces needed to put it together. The instructions were simple but not on a separate piece of paper. They were printed on one of the longer flaps of box the chair came in. Putting it together was straight forward but was difficult to manage without a table/bench. The reason was because the pieces have to be held in a specific angle to put together. It was not a big deal and I was able to get it done fairly quickly. If you have a second person to assist, you can put it together in less than 15 minutes.The chair is very comfortable. I ordered this for my wife and she has been using it daily. The seat cushion is thick and very comfortable. The back is mesh and allows air flow. She loves the fact the arm rest can move back to be out of the way or brought forward for support. Their height can also be adjusted. The chair height adjustment lever works perfectly and the wheels are very smooth. The material is not the best but not being leather or leather-like material is what made this chair attractive to us. We love this chair for its comfort, sturdiness and the way it supports the body. Sitting on it for long hours is comfortable. If you are in the market for one, give these a closer look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You Might Need Two People to Assemble
reviews.reviewText: I was really surprised about how wide the seat is on this chair. It is well padded and seems comfortable so far. It is a huge upgrade from the cheap chair I've been using. I'm still working on finding the perfect position but it's new. I assembled it on my own and it was doable but would have been so so so much easier if there had been a second person there to help when I had to attach the seat and the back together to the arms. I also didn't know what to expect from the wheels. I have carpet in my office and I wasn't sure it would move easily but it rolls so smoothly without getting caught. It might not be super cute or trendy but my back thanks me for the better support so I'm a happy camper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly unexpected comfort and size.
reviews.reviewText: I'm always looking to add more chairs to my collection, as I don;t like using only one. This was a pleasant surprise after I assembled it.PROSIt's very easy to assemble, I believe it only took me about 20 minutes to get this together.It's comfortable. The seat is wide and thick, providing more than enough cushion to ensure that my backside doesn't get sore or go numb during the day.The value is there. There's plenty of ergonomic chairs that go for well over $500, but this is well below that, making it a very attainable and affordable office chair.CONSThe instructions could have been a bit more clear. Luckily, the chair was easy enough to figure out without really needing to read the instructions, but I still like to read them to make sure I'm doing everything 100% to manufacturer spec.Overall, this is a great office chair, that provides a lot of comfort and is easy to set up. I would recommend this to anybody who is looking for a more comfortable, and more ergonomic solution to stiff, uncomfortable office chairs.
